hero_subtitle:
Software Engineer & AI Innovator
Founder of DigitalSeventy
about_text1: I’m Ahmed Tijani, a software engineer and AI innovator building advanced systems that help companies automate workflows, organize data, and turn information into operational power.
about_text2: Through my company DigitalSeventy, I design flexible and intelligent business tools that solve real problems for modern organizations.
p1_desc: A flexible ERP that allows companies to build internal apps without coding, supported by an intelligent AI assistant that adapts to each business.
p2_desc: Turns any file into a complete web, mobile, or desktop app automatically. No coding required. Fully customizable with visual tools.
p3_desc: An automated communication system that speaks English, Arabic, French, and Spanish naturally. Handles customer calls 24/7 with full context.
openseventy_desc: OpenSeventy is a free open-source toolkit for small and medium businesses, offering simple and practical utilities for data conversion, automation, reporting, and system integration.
vision_desc: DigitalSeventy aims to build an intelligent ecosystem where businesses can transform processes into automation, data into applications, and communication into smart AI-driven systems.
hobbies_desc: Exploring AI models locally on advanced hardware as a personal learning and experimentation hobby.
footer_text: © 2025 Ahmed Tijani — DigitalSeventy. All rights reserved.
